issue.detect: Check report and find ONLY 2 new files are not backed up
issue.fix: Backup new file from SQLPlus using RMAN host out

issue.detect: Check report and find no data collected, test system connection remotely rejected with expired password
issue.fix: Reset system password to old one and create app_user profile and assign system to it

issue.detect: Check report and find no data collected, test system connection remotely rejected with expired password
issue.fix: Reset system password to old one and create app_user profile and assign system to it

issue.detect: Check report and find no data collected, test connection from sqlplus using sysdba, rejected
issue.cause: database instance is not even mounted, host is rebooted 1 day before Jan 9th, 4pm
issue.fix: mount and open database, recollect data and analyze data again from APEX interface

issue.detect: Check report and find no data collected
issue.cause: I shut it down myself last night
issue.fix: mount and open database, recollect data and analyze data again from APEX interface
